MEMO TOi In-School Program Acceptance Committee
FROM? Marguerite Fleming
I have held this list hoping to get it double checked by headquarters before I
sent it to you; however, I feel that it must get in the mail today.
If by any chance there are any tapes that you have not received and you want to
try 'bo gat them from John Holt, please get in touch with him directly.,
I am confused about our judging programs that are being carried on rtha other
Network” now, but John Holt will meet tfith us in New York and he, of course,
is the Answer Man.
There seams to be no objection to our meeting Wednesday night so I am taking it
for granted that it is a satisfactory time «
Please note the suggestions for changing names of committees . Sea Yellow Sheet0
